channel.title: Comments on: Buy or Sell, What the Hell #25: Building a Crypto Portfolio

item.title: By: kyang
item.dc:creator: kyang
item.description: I do not know flock but it''s good they bought the .com, sorry I was not the owner lol In the crypto industry, I am seeing this year how most alts creators are migrating from slack to discord. If flock is also getting slack customers than the days of slack are maybe counted.
item.content:encoded: I do not know flock but it”s good they bought the .com, sorry I was not the owner lol In the crypto industry, I am seeing this year how most alts creators are migrating from slack to discord. If flock is also getting slack customers than the days of slack are maybe counted.

item.description: Maybe Elon Musk's plan for global satellite internet fixes the telecom problem proposed on the podcast t
